pkg.name: fieldset
pkg.title: Fieldset
pkg.description: The Fieldset component is used to group related form fields and includes a descriptive legend to label the group, helping users understand the relationship between these form fields.

scope.title: Fieldset
scope.description: The Fieldset component is used to group related form fields and includes a descriptive legend to label the group, helping users understand the relationship between these form fields.

relatedComponents.name: control-group
relatedComponents.title: Control group
relatedComponents.description: Control groups allow related checkboxes and radios to be grouped together.

relatedComponents.name: field
relatedComponents.title: Field
relatedComponents.description: The field package exposes the elements around form inputs, and an API to compose them.
